synopsis.text: Eleven Raimon, a passionate soccer team, receives an unusual invitation from the enigmatic Fifth Sector for a soccer camp. Little do they know, the invitation is a trap set to eliminate them on the isolated island of God Eden. With their backs against the wall, the team must push their limits and intensify their training to stand a chance against Fifth Sector's sinister plans. As they uncover the dark secrets behind youth soccer's governing body, the Raimon team is determined to prove their strength and expose Fifth Sector's wrongdoings. Will they be able to triumph over adversity and secure their freedom? Join Tenma, Shindou, Tsurugi, and the rest of the Raimon team as they fight for their future in this high-stakes soccer battle.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
